<S>1161</S> There were present<S>3918</S> at<S>1722</S> that season<S>846</S> <S>2540</S> some<S>5100</S> that told<S>518</S> him<S>846</S> of<S>4012</S> the Galilaeans<S>1057</S>, whose<S>3739</S> blood<S>129</S> Pilate<S>4091</S> had mingled<S>3396</S> with<S>3326</S> their<S>846</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Suppose ye<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> these<S>3778</S> Galilaeans<S>1057</S> were<S>1096</S> sinners<S>268</S> above<S>3844</S> all<S>3956</S> the Galilaeans<S>1057</S>, because<S>3754</S> they suffered<S>3958</S> such things<S>5108</S>?
I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S>, Nay<S>3780</S>: but<S>235</S>, except<S>3362</S> ye repent<S>3340</S>, ye shall<S>622</S> all<S>3956</S> likewise<S>5615</S> perish<S>622</S>.
Or<S>2228</S> those<S>1565</S> eighteen<S>1176</S> <S>2532</S> <S>3638</S>, upon<S>1909</S> whom<S>3739</S> the tower<S>4444</S> in<S>1722</S> Siloam<S>4611</S> fell<S>4098</S>, and<S>2532</S> slew<S>615</S> them<S>846</S>, think ye<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> they<S>3778</S> were<S>1096</S> sinners<S>3781</S> above<S>3844</S> all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S> that dwelt<S>2730</S> in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>? <sup>sinners: or, debtors</sup>
I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S>, Nay<S>3780</S>: but<S>235</S>, except<S>3362</S> ye repent<S>3340</S>, ye shall<S>622</S> all<S>3956</S> likewise<S>3668</S> perish<S>622</S>.
He spake<S>3004</S> also<S>1161</S> this<S>5026</S> parable<S>3850</S>; A certain<S>5100</S> man had<S>2192</S> a fig tree<S>4808</S> planted<S>5452</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> vineyard<S>290</S>; and<S>2532</S> he came<S>2064</S> and sought<S>2212</S> fruit<S>2590</S> thereon<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> found<S>2147</S> none<S>3756</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said he<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> the dresser of his vineyard<S>289</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, these three<S>5140</S> years<S>2094</S> I come<S>2064</S> seeking<S>2212</S> fruit<S>2590</S> on<S>1722</S> this<S>5026</S> fig tree<S>4808</S>, and<S>2532</S> find<S>2147</S> none<S>3756</S>: cut<S>1581</S> it<S>846</S> down<S>1581</S>; why<S>2444</S> <S>2532</S> cumbereth<S>2673</S> it<S>846</S> the ground<S>1093</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he answering<S>611</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, let<S>863</S> it<S>846</S> alone<S>863</S> this<S>5124</S> year<S>2094</S> also<S>2532</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>3755</S> I shall dig<S>4626</S> about<S>4012</S> it<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> dung<S>906</S> <S>2874</S> it:
And if<S>2579</S> <S>3303</S> it bear<S>4160</S> fruit<S>2590</S>, well: and if not<S>1490</S>, then after that<S>1519</S> <S>3195</S> thou shalt cut<S>1581</S> it<S>846</S> down<S>1581</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he was<S>2258</S> teaching<S>1321</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>3391</S> of the synagogues<S>4864</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath<S>4521</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, there was<S>2258</S> a woman<S>1135</S> which had<S>2192</S> a spirit<S>4151</S> of infirmity<S>769</S> eighteen<S>1176</S> <S>2532</S> <S>3638</S> years<S>2094</S>, and<S>2532</S> was<S>2258</S> bowed together<S>4794</S>, and<S>2532</S> could<S>1410</S> in<S>1519</S> no<S>3361</S> wise<S>3838</S> lift up<S>352</S> herself.
And<S>1161</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> saw<S>1492</S> her<S>846</S>, he called<S>4377</S> her to him, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, thou art loosed<S>630</S> from thine<S>4675</S> infirmity<S>769</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he laid<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> on<S>2007</S> her<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> immediately<S>3916</S> she was made straight<S>461</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorified<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the ruler of the synagogue<S>752</S> answered<S>611</S> with indignation<S>23</S>, because<S>3754</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> had healed<S>2323</S> on the sabbath<S>4521</S> day, and said<S>3004</S> unto the people<S>3793</S>, There are<S>1526</S> six<S>1803</S> days<S>2250</S> in<S>1722</S> which<S>3739</S> men ought<S>1163</S> to work<S>2038</S>: in<S>1722</S> them<S>5025</S> therefore<S>3767</S> come<S>2064</S> and be healed<S>2323</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> on the sabbath<S>4521</S> day<S>2250</S>.
The Lord<S>2962</S> then<S>3767</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>,  Thou hypocrite<S>5273</S>, doth<S>3089</S> not<S>3756</S> each one<S>1538</S> of you<S>5216</S> on the sabbath<S>4521</S> loose<S>3089</S> his<S>846</S> ox<S>1016</S> or<S>2228</S> his ass<S>3688</S> from<S>575</S> the stall<S>5336</S>, and<S>2532</S> lead him away<S>520</S> to watering<S>4222</S>?
And<S>1161</S> ought<S>1163</S> not<S>3756</S> this woman<S>5026</S>, being<S>5607</S> a daughter<S>2364</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, whom<S>3739</S> Satan<S>4567</S> hath bound<S>1210</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, these eighteen<S>1176</S> <S>2532</S> <S>3638</S> years<S>2094</S>, be loosed<S>3089</S> from<S>575</S> this<S>5127</S> bond<S>1199</S> on the sabbath<S>4521</S> day<S>2250</S>?
And<S>2532</S> when he<S>846</S> had said<S>3004</S> these things<S>5023</S>, all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> adversaries<S>480</S> were ashamed<S>2617</S>: and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the people<S>3793</S> rejoiced<S>5463</S> for<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> the glorious things<S>1741</S> that were done<S>1096</S> by<S>5259</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said he<S>3004</S>, Unto what<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> like<S>3664</S>? and<S>2532</S> whereunto<S>5101</S> shall I resemble<S>3666</S> it<S>846</S>?
It is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> a grain<S>2848</S> of mustard seed<S>4615</S>, which<S>3739</S> a man<S>444</S> took<S>2983</S>, and cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>1438</S> garden<S>2779</S>; and<S>2532</S> it grew<S>837</S>, and<S>2532</S> waxed<S>1096</S> <S>1519</S> a great<S>3173</S> tree<S>1186</S>; and<S>2532</S> the fowls<S>4071</S> of the air<S>3772</S> lodged<S>2681</S> in<S>1722</S> the branches<S>2798</S> of it<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S> he said<S>2036</S>, Whereunto<S>5101</S> shall I liken<S>3666</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>?
It is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> leaven<S>2219</S>, which<S>3739</S> a woman<S>1135</S> took<S>2983</S> and hid<S>1470</S> in<S>1519</S> three<S>5140</S> measures<S>4568</S> of meal<S>224</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>3739</S> the whole<S>3650</S> was leavened<S>2220</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he went<S>1279</S> through<S>2596</S> the cities<S>4172</S> and<S>2532</S> villages<S>2968</S>, teaching<S>1321</S>, and<S>2532</S> journeying<S>4160</S> <S>4197</S> toward<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> one<S>5100</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, are there few<S>1487</S> <S>3641</S> that be saved<S>4982</S>? And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>,
Strive<S>75</S> to enter in<S>1525</S> at<S>1223</S> the strait<S>4728</S> gate<S>4439</S>: for<S>3754</S> many<S>4183</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, will seek<S>2212</S> to enter in<S>1525</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>2480</S> not<S>3756</S> be able<S>2480</S>.
When once<S>575</S> <S>3739</S> <S>302</S> the master of the house<S>3617</S> is risen up<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath shut<S>608</S> to the door<S>2374</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye begin<S>756</S> to stand<S>2476</S> without<S>1854</S>, and<S>2532</S> to knock<S>2925</S> at the door<S>2374</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, open<S>455</S> unto us<S>2254</S>; and<S>2532</S> he shall answer<S>611</S> and say<S>2046</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, I know<S>1492</S> you<S>5209</S> not<S>3756</S> whence<S>4159</S> ye are<S>2075</S>:
Then<S>5119</S> shall ye begin<S>756</S> to say<S>3004</S>, We have eaten<S>5315</S> and<S>2532</S> drunk<S>4095</S> in thy<S>4675</S> presence<S>1799</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou hast taught<S>1321</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> streets<S>4113</S>.
But<S>2532</S> he shall say<S>2046</S>, I tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S>, I know<S>1492</S> you<S>5209</S> not<S>3756</S> whence<S>4159</S> ye are<S>2075</S>; depart<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> me<S>1700</S>, all<S>3956</S> ye workers<S>2040</S> of iniquity<S>93</S>.
There<S>1563</S> shall be<S>2071</S> weeping<S>2805</S> and<S>2532</S> gnashing<S>1030</S> of teeth<S>3599</S>, when<S>3752</S> ye shall see<S>3700</S> Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> Jacob<S>2384</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>, in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>1161</S> you<S>5209</S> yourselves thrust<S>1544</S> out<S>1854</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they shall come<S>2240</S> from<S>575</S> the east<S>395</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the west<S>1424</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> the north<S>1005</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the south<S>3558</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall sit down<S>347</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, there are<S>1526</S> last<S>2078</S> which<S>3739</S> shall be<S>2071</S> first<S>4413</S>, and<S>2532</S> there are<S>1526</S> first<S>4413</S> which<S>3739</S> shall be<S>2071</S> last<S>2078</S>.
The same<S>1722</S> <S>846</S> day<S>2250</S> there came<S>4334</S> certain<S>5100</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Get thee out<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> depart<S>4198</S> hence<S>1782</S>: for<S>3754</S> Herod<S>2264</S> will<S>2309</S> kill<S>615</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Go ye<S>4198</S>, and tell<S>2036</S> that<S>5026</S> fox<S>258</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I cast out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S>, and<S>2532</S> I do<S>2005</S> cures<S>2392</S> to day<S>4594</S> and<S>2532</S> to morrow<S>839</S>, and<S>2532</S> the third<S>5154</S> day I shall be perfected<S>5048</S>.
Nevertheless<S>4133</S> I<S>3165</S> must<S>1163</S> walk<S>4198</S> to day<S>4594</S>, and<S>2532</S> to morrow<S>839</S>, and<S>2532</S> the day following<S>2192</S>: for<S>3754</S> it cannot be<S>3756</S> <S>1735</S> that a prophet<S>4396</S> perish<S>622</S> out of<S>1854</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>.
O Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, which<S>3588</S> killest<S>615</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>, and<S>2532</S> stonest<S>3036</S> them that are sent<S>649</S> unto<S>4314</S> thee<S>846</S>; how often<S>4212</S> would<S>2309</S> I have gathered<S>1996</S> thy<S>4675</S> children<S>5043</S> together<S>1996</S>, as<S>3739</S> <S>5158</S> a hen<S>3733</S> doth gather her<S>1438</S> brood<S>3555</S> under<S>5259</S> her wings<S>4420</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>!
Behold<S>2400</S>, your<S>5216</S> house<S>3624</S> is left<S>863</S> unto you<S>5213</S> desolate<S>2048</S>: and<S>1161</S> verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> Ye shall<S>1492</S> not<S>3364</S> see<S>1492</S> me<S>3165</S>, until<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> the time come<S>2240</S> when<S>3753</S> ye shall say<S>2036</S>, Blessed<S>2127</S> is he that cometh<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>.
